profile.name: Corwin Ruggiero
profile.blurb: I am a young artist from Lunenburg, MA with a focus in animation looking to make everyone a little happier.

posts.title: A Watercolor Tree
posts.blurb: A simple watercolor tree I made some time ago.

posts.title: Some Watercolor Sour Grapes
posts.blurb: Some sour grapes I made some time ago.

posts.title: A Worn Pair of Watercolor Shoes
posts.blurb: These weren't really made for walking.

posts.title: Watercolor Shapes
posts.blurb: Technically everything I've done in watercolor simplifies to watercolor shapes, this is just more specific.

posts.title: A Watercolor Seaside
posts.blurb: Who doesn't want to spend a day by the sea?

posts.title: Watercolor Iron
posts.blurb: My clothes were looking a bit wrinkly, but I think you're supposed to fill the iron with water, not make it out of water(color).

posts.title: Watercolor Beach
posts.blurb: Being on the seaside was so nice I decided to get a little closer to the water.

posts.title: Boatcano!
posts.blurb: Take cover, this boat is going blow!

posts.title: Lamppost and Friend
posts.blurb: My lamppost sculpture found a friend and decided to hang around with them.

posts.title: Lamppost and Friend pt. 2
posts.blurb: A rear view of my lamppost and their buddy.

posts.title: A Letter Transforms!
posts.blurb: This letter has a special magic trick to share with everyone!

posts.title: Personified Milk
posts.blurb: This milk feels like walking, and that's just what it'll do.
